## RLog.withSinks() method

Creates a new [RLog](./rlog.rlog.md) instance with all of the given `sinks` added.

Version of [withSink](./rlog.rlog.withsink.md) that allows you to provide multiple sinks at once.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withSinks(sinks: ReadonlyArray<LogSinkCallback>, minLevel?: LogLevel): RLog;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

sinks


</td><td>

ReadonlyArray&lt;[LogSinkCallback](./rlog.logsinkcallback.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

Array of sink callbacks.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

minLevel


</td><td>

[LogLevel](./rlog.loglevel.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The minimum [LogLevel](./rlog.loglevel.md) for the sinks. The sinks will not be called for logs that are below this. Defaults to [LogLevel.VERBOSE](./rlog.loglevel.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[RLog](./rlog.rlog.md)

The new [RLog](./rlog.rlog.md) instance.
